entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Beauharnois
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:24 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low 8. Forecast issued 6:24 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 6:24 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
